## Welcome back!

Please try to log on to Hunt Cloud

1. Connect to the VPN with tunnelblick
2. Go to the course server: <https://healthai-course-2025.lab.hdc.ntnu.no/>
3. Open a terminal & install more packages:
  ```sh
  conda activate r-base
  conda install r-workflows r-tune r-mlbench r-ranger r-randomforest
  ```
4. Launch an RStudio session
5. If you haven't, clone the repo:
  ```sh
  git clone https://github.com/bnwolford/HealthAIinR
  ```
  If you have already cloned it, update it:
  ```sh
  cd /path/to/HealthAIinR
  git pull
  ```
